text: atah jo log eemaan lae aur unhonne achchhe karm kie, jo allaah unhen unaka poora-poora badala dega aur apane udaar anugrah se unhen aur adhik pradaan karega. aur jin logon ne bandagee ko bura samajha aur ghamand kiya, to unhen vah dukhad yaatana dega. aur ve allaah se bach sakane ke lie na apana koee nikat ka samarthak paenge aur na hee koee sahaayak
